taskbody.context: To start in Windows, do as follows:

step.cmd: After downloading the .zip file, extract it to the C:\Users\<username> folder.

li.p: For Windows users, if you are extracting Katalon Studio outside of the C:\Users\<username> folder, make sure the current user has the Read/Write permission for Katalon Studio package or runs the software with administrator privileges.

step.cmd: To start , double-click on the katalon.exe file.

li.p: Ensure you are using the default font size (set to 100%) in both and your current OS to avoid the name field not being displayed on some pop-up windows. To adjust the font size:

ul.li: For Windows, you can refer to the Microsoft document here: Edit the font size.
For : Go to Window > Preferences > General > Appearance > Colors and Fonts. Select Dialog Font and edit the font size.
